mapper.update: update reboard set restep=restep+1 where regroup=#{regroup} and restep>#{restep}
mapper.select: select * from reboard order by regroup desc, restep asc limit #{start},#{perpage}
mapper.insert: insert into reboard (writer, pass, subject, content, upload, regroup, restep, relevel, writeday) values (#{writer}, #{pass}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{upload}, #{regroup}, #{restep}, #{relevel}, now())
mapper.update: update reboard set readcount=readcount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reboard where num=#{num} and pass=#{pass}
